conversation.message: We are thrilled by the prospect of joining Nursery_C. Your program aligns perfectly with our family values and educational goals. We formally submit our application now.
conversation.thought:
As Parent_C, my goal is to secure my highest possible preference. My true preference list starts with Nursery_C. Since this is Round 1, the optimal strategy is to apply immediately to my top choice, Nursery_C. 

Analyzing the likely applications based on top preferences:
Parent_A -> Nursery_B
Parent_B -> Nursery_A
Parent_C -> Nursery_C (Me)

Parent_E -> Nursery_E

Although Parent_C is ranked 3rd by Nursery_C (behind P_A and P_B), if the higher-ranked parents propose elsewhere, Nursery_C should accept Parent_C's application, as they have capacity 1. I will use the [APPLY] tag.
